title: Lifeguard Sivir

embed.description: One of my favorite League of Legends Champions. Inspired by: <da:thumb id="485692794">

body:
This is what I'd like for Christmas.

Thanks.

replies.body: Shame riot refuses to release anymore summer related skins.
Maybe because it's Winter?

that is discrimination!!!

we shall not stand for it!!!
Hey! Its summer for the southern hemisphere
Most of the southern hemisphere is water anway
She looks like Taric

Outrageous. Truly, truly, truly, outrageous.
{{champion:44}}
Dat bod tho~
There's been an inexplicable rise in near-drownings while Sivir is on duty.

But who goes swimming at Christmas time o-O
Really like the skin though! Would be really cool. Still waiting on pool party ahri...

> [{quoted}](name=Aspynn,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=I4TdWZBa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-15T01:57:14.745+0000)
> But who goes swimming at Christmas time o-O

The entire Southern Hemisphere.

>
> But who goes swimming at Christmas time o-O
> Really like the skin though! Would be really cool. Still waiting on pool party ahri...

people in florida lolz
Denizens of Hawaii.
Damn she looks like Wonder Woman
I like my women fit, but that looks like a dude...

> [{quoted}](name=SexyTaylorSwift,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=I4TdWZBa,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-15T02:15:24.607+0000)
> I like my women fit, but that looks like a dude...

If you think that is what a dude looks like, then go explore your sexuality.

I am well aware of what a girl looks like, but the muscles on her face and thighs kind of throw it off. I think that's what he's getting at.

Guess he dosnt like Muscular Ladies.

> [{quoted}](name=SexyTaylorSwift,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=I4TdWZBa,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-15T02:15:24.607+0000)
> I like my women fit, but that looks like a dude...

I'd still hit it.

Sivir's boobs aren't that big.  I have done some *very* extensive research on the ladies' of League's mammary glands, and that's about as big of a size increase as Classic Ashe to Amethyst Ashe or Classic Vayne to SKT T1 Vayne.

> [{quoted}](name=Remlap1223,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=I4TdWZBa,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2014-12-15T16:10:41.335+0000)
> Sivir's boobs aren't that big.  I have done some *very* extensive research on the ladies' of League's mammary glands, and that's about as big of a size increase as Classic Ashe to Amethyst Ashe or Classic Vayne to SKT T1 Vayne.

Can you share with me your peer reviewed research please. I need to analyse it for ..... scientific purposes.
Increase the size. That swimsuit is so.... tight. It should cover more of her.... nether regions. Jeez. And she looks almost too cut. Like all of her curves got hacked at.
Honestly, it'd look much better simply by giving her some mass at her waist and a boob downsize. She looks like she's about to snap in half at the waist.

> [{quoted}](name=cshakes,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=I4TdWZBa,comment-id=00150000,timestamp=2014-12-15T11:36:54.281+0000)
> Honestly, it'd look much better simply by giving her some mass at her waist and a boob downsize. She looks like she's about to snap in half at the waist.

Both of the comments below disgust me.
I like the concept, but this art doesn't particularly read as sivir to me.
hell yeah i buy this skin now is part of my pool party crew.
I do not like this at all. She looks like a man.
I hope this satisfies you
I think her swimsuit is a little loose. Make it a few sizes smaller.
I want this so hard. And what would be more awesome is if she blew that whistle when she ulted!
Since when is sivir more muscular than draven{{champion:119}}
Needs bigger boobs to satisfy teenagers

> [{quoted}](name=Solaxo,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=I4TdWZBa,comment-id=001a,timestamp=2014-12-15T15:54:01.463+0000)
> Needs bigger boobs to satisfy teenagers

+1
Pool Party Sivir it is, only thing I would add is maybe a towel over her shoulder, sunglasses & flip flops. Oh and I would change the tiara into a headband and we have pool party Sivir
Tiara could be sunglasses propped on her head
cant really judge the skin i need a rear view to give a valid statement...
You mean wonderwoman sivir lol?
She's like Chun Li in that...
Love the concept, hate that image X-x
I love the idea! That swim suit looks uncomfortably tight though...
I just came in my pants sorry
{{champion:44}} Outrageous.
That's too revealing, but I'd definitely buy a lifeguard Sivir skin. Give her some guard shorts and she's fine. Add some sunglasses and crocs/sandals for good measure.

So first thing that came to mind:

*Sigh, here we go again... **unzips.**

Second thing that came to mind:

*Wait, that kinda looks like Taric.*

Guys.  Am I {{champion:81}}?

this concept is OUTRAGEOUS OuO
would totally buy it, Rito pls
Ooooh! I would so buy this skin.
Would it just fall under pool party Sivir or would it be it's own entity like Primetime Draven?
Why the hell does she have a man package?!

I would by this  an d similar art    for  ahri sona  vi lux   cait  irelia  ...  well  basically the majority of females  ....

Kinda looks like she has a {{champion:74}}
I didn't even open the post, I just up voted it, then came here to say this :0 all I saw was the word "Sivir" and a picture of someone holding a Lifesaver.
